title: Heart of Pearl
creator_credit: Andrew G Taylor, Jo-Anne McGowan and AFTRS
brief_description: An old soldier is trapped in time. Only a ticking watch separates his ritual from the enveloping jungle … ‘Heart of Pearl’ is based on stories of Japanese soldiers who remained in hiding in the jungle for decades after the end of World War II.
